attributes.action: make a new law to allocate all pornographic webites to register their websites under 1 domain of .xxx
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A law making all pornographic websites including any websites promoting such material to register under one internet domain ending with .XXX would enable the young and vunerable all over the world to be protected from adult sexual material.

This makes sense across the board, whether you are someone that does use these kind of websites you must surely agree that our chidren and young teenagers should be protected from this material.

It would also allow for the first time an easier option for parents and ISP companies to choose to block these sites through internet parental controls

rejection.details: This is a matter for ICANN
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
